familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.description: Former member/president of DT Marks Bali LLC, of which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and exists to hold license deals that are prospective, inactive, or that otherwise do not currently have valuable assets or create income.

Former director/chairman/president of DT Marks Bali Member Corp., of which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and exists to hold license deals that are prospective, inactive, or that otherwise do not currently have valuable assets or create income.

conflictDescription: TEST DESCRIPTION FOR THE CONFLICT (Friendly Name): Dt Marks Bali
